languages.text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 round. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: Когда на союзника действуют {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}, предоставляющие {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, этот союзник получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} на 1 раунд. Эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an ally is affected by the Leader's ability or talent that grants temporary wounds, that ally's armour is increased by +10% for 1 round. Does not stack.
Whenever an ally is affected by a Leader's ability or talent that grants temporary wounds, that ally's armour is increased by +10% for 1 round. Does not stack.

Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 round. Does not stack.

languages.text: Когда на союзника действуют {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g}, предоставляющие {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g}, этот союзник получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} на 1 раунд. Эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 round. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Когда на союзника действуют способность или талант лидера, предоставляющие временное здоровье, этот союзник получает +10% к броне на 1 раунд. Эффект не суммируется.
Когда на союзника действуют способность или талант лидера, предоставляющие временное здоровье, этот союзник получает +10% к броне на 1 раунд. Эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: 每当一名盟友受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}影响而获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}也会提高10%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当一名盟友受到领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}影响，获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}时，该盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}也会提高10%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado se vea afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} que otorgue {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de ese aliado se incrementa en un +10 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado se vea afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} del oficial que otorgue {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} de ese aliado se incrementa en un +10 % durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter von einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} eines {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g} betroffen ist, die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} gewähren, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} dieses Verbündeten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +10 % erhöht. Stapelt sich nicht.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein Verbündeter von einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder einem {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} eines Offiziers betroffen ist, die {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g} gewähren, wird die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} dieses Verbündeten für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} um +10 % erhöht. Stapelt sich nicht.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} qui confère des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, une augmentation de +10 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de cet allié pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Non cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'un allié est sous l'effet d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} de Leader qui confère des {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}, une augmentation de +10 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de cet allié pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Non cumulable.

languages.text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}の、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を付与する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}の効果を受けた時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、10%増加する。累積しない。
languages.original_text: Whenever an ally is affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} that grants {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}, that ally's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} is increased by +10% for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 味方がリーダーの、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を付与する{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}の効果を受けた時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、10%増加する。累積しない。
